接口的使用
org.springframework.core.type.filter.TypeFilter

  • 使用TypeFilter的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.context.annotation
    Annotation support for the Application Context, including JSR-250 "common" annotations, component-scanning, and Java-based metadata for creating Spring-managed objects.
    org.springframework.core.type.filter
    Core support package for type filtering (e.g. for classpath scanning).
    org.springframework.orm.hibernate5
    Package providing integration of Hibernate 5.x with Spring concepts.

    • org.springframework.context.annotation中TypeFilter的使用

      返回TypeFilter的org.springframework.context.annotation中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected TypeFilter ComponentScanBeanDefinitionParser.createTypeFilter(Element element, ClassLoader classLoader, ParserContext parserContext) 
      参数类型为TypeFilter的org.springframework.context.annotation中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void ClassPathScanningCandidateComponentProvider.addExcludeFilter(TypeFilter excludeFilter)
      Add an exclude type filter to the front of the exclusion list.
      void ClassPathScanningCandidateComponentProvider.addIncludeFilter(TypeFilter includeFilter)
      Add an include type filter to the end of the inclusion list.

    • org.springframework.core.type.filter中TypeFilter的使用

      实现TypeFilter的org.springframework.core.type.filter中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  AbstractClassTestingTypeFilter
      Type filter that exposes a ClassMetadata object to subclasses, for class testing purposes.
      class  AbstractTypeHierarchyTraversingFilter
      Type filter that is aware of traversing over hierarchy.
      class  AnnotationTypeFilter
      A simple TypeFilter which matches classes with a given annotation, checking inherited annotations as well.
      class  AspectJTypeFilter
      Type filter that uses AspectJ type pattern for matching.
      class  AssignableTypeFilter
      A simple filter which matches classes that are assignable to a given type.
      class  RegexPatternTypeFilter
      A simple filter for matching a fully-qualified class name with a regex Pattern.

    • org.springframework.orm.hibernate5中TypeFilter的使用

      参数类型为TypeFilter的org.springframework.orm.hibernate5中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void LocalSessionFactoryBean.setEntityTypeFilters(TypeFilter... entityTypeFilters)
      Specify custom type filters for Spring-based scanning for entity classes.
      LocalSessionFactoryBuilder LocalSessionFactoryBuilder.setEntityTypeFilters(TypeFilter... entityTypeFilters)
      Specify custom type filters for Spring-based scanning for entity classes.
